extension.summary: XBMC Color Picker
extension.description: XBMC Color Picker

extension.summary: Library Editor Script
extension.description: This script makes it possible to edit movie details manually from within XBMC. Needs Skin Support
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991

extension.summary: Movie Set Artwork Automator
extension.description:
This addon will automatically set artwork for all movie sets in your library.
The addon can search for common parent folders of movies within a set or you can specify a single artwork folder containing artwork for all your movie sets (eg <set name>-poster.jpg).

extension.summary: Script used by skins to show extended media info.
extension.description: This script fetches extended information for several media types (artists, albums, movie sets etc.). Needs skin support.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991

extension.description: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeon:lta.
complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: [B]Based on v5.9.2 of Aeon Nox 5[CR][B]What's new[/B][CR]- Krypton combatibility updates[CR]- Merge latest updates from BigNoid/master[CR]- Rework Widget settings[CR]- Move some Main Menu customizer functions to the context menu (can use mapped key or longpress of select/enter to bring up the context menu)[CR]- Numerous PVR changes and fixes[CR]- New Customization section in skin settings[CR]- Arial font fixes[CR]- Add user selectable login screen background[CR]- Add user selectable InfoPopup delay[CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

extension.news: [B]Based on v5.9.2 of Aeon Nox 5[CR][B]What's new![/B][CR]- Removed now, next, & channel listings from the EPG window[CR]- New search button options (taken from Estuary)[CR]- Krypton combatibility updates[CR]- Merge latest updates from BigNoid/master[CR]- Rework Widget settings[CR]- Move some Main Menu customizer functions to the context menu (can use mapped key or longpress of select/enter to bring up the context menu)[CR]- Numerous PVR changes and fixes[CR]- New Customization section in skin settings[CR]- Arial font fixes[CR]- Add user selectable login screen background[CR]- Add user selectable InfoPopup delay[CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v6.0.1[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and/or improvements[CR][I]v6.0.10[/I][CR]- Add option to disable Logos in Music Visualization[CR]- Remove some global Widget options and add to Main Menu Widget customizer[CR]- MyWeather layout fixes[CR]- Fix text width in DialogSelect[CR]- Change hide wigets until focused and disable widget fanart to a per Widget option in the Widget customizer[CR]- Add mini fullscreen video info layout[CR]- Update language files from TransiFex[CR]- Reorganize some skin settings sections[CR]- Some List view fixes[CR][I]v6.0.9[/I][CR]- Rework Widget template file - noticeable performance increase ;) [CR]- Skin Shortcuts Management dialog fixes[CR]- Hide player artwork when dialogs active[CR][I]v6.0.8[/I][CR]- Fix navigation issue for centered menu[CR]- Update language files from Transifex[CR]- Fix InfoWall overlap issue[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å tilby en moderne utforming, samtidig som den klassiske Aeon-følelsen er beholdt.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Modern görünüme kavuşturmak için baştan tasarlandı, klasik Aeon hissi korundu
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
完全的翻新設計以創造現代化的視覺感受，同時仍維持Aeon的經典外觀。

extension.description: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeon:lta.
complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.

extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v5.9.4[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][I]v6.0.2[/I][CR]- Rework InfoPanel options[CR]- Some Widget fixes[CR]- Add BigNoids LibreElec settings screen[CR]- Add BigNoids sortletter jump to ShowCase, Landscape, Shift, Logo, MyFlix, Rightlist, and Panel views[CR][I]v6.0.1[/I][CR]- Removed now, next, & channel listings from the EPG window[CR]- New search button options (taken from Estuary)[CR][I]v6.0.0[/I][CR]- Rework Widget settings[CR]- Move some Main Menu customizer functions to the context menu (can use mapped key or longpress of select/enter to bring up the context menu)[CR]- Numerous PVR changes and fixes[CR]- New Customization section in skin settings[CR]- Arial font fixes[CR]- Add user selectable login screen background[CR]- Add user selectable InfoPopup delay[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.

extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v6.0.1[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][I]v6.0.5[/I][CR]- Fix color customization not opening[CR]- Small redesign of DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add and fix some Widget plugin paths[CR]- Revert PNG changes that altered panel colors[CR]- Add support for animated weather icons[CR]- Add background selection to Music Viz[CR]- Add LibreELEC to settings[CR][I]v6.0.4[/I][CR]- Compatibility updates for new Skin Helper version[CR]- Add manfeeds Video Lyrics mod v2 (thanks manfeed)[CR]- Add option to hide player control buttons on Music OSD[CR]- Redesigned System Settings screen[CR]- New logo (thanks GTunney!)[CR][I]v6.0.3[/I][CR]- Add player controls to sidemenu[CR]- Add option to disable Widget fanart[CR]- Shuffle skin settings with added catagories[CR]- Add FAQ in Help section[CR]- Add option to hide Home Window elements when pressing back[CR]- Add option to use paused label instead of image[CR]- Add snow to Music Viz background[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v6.0.1[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][I]v6.0.6[/I][CR]- Re-design Main Menu Customizer[CR]- Re-design Fullscreen Info[CR]- Fix aspect ratio for PVR Widgets[CR]- Update language files from Transifex[CR]- Fix Home background not showing when Widget fanart is missing[CR]- Fix mouse issues in Menu customizer for Android devices[CR]- Remove skin versions of Extended Info xmls and drop support for replacing DialogVideoInfo (Can be re-added by uncommenting out onloads and visibles)[CR]- Fix some non-default font issues[CR]- DialogSelect fixes[CR]- Ask for default background when entering home[CR]- Drop script.colorbox support[CR][I]v6.0.5[/I][CR]- Fix color customization not opening[CR]- Small redesign of DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add and fix some Widget plugin paths[CR]- Revert PNG changes that altered panel colors[CR]- Add support for animated weather icons[CR]- Add background selection to Music Viz[CR]- Add LibreELEC to settings[CR][I]v6.0.4[/I][CR]- Compatibility updates for new Skin Helper version[CR]- Add manfeeds Video Lyrics mod v2 (thanks manfeed)[CR]- Add option to hide player control buttons on Music OSD[CR]- Redesigned System Settings screen[CR]- New logo (thanks GTunney!)[CR][I]v6.0.3[/I][CR]- Add player controls to sidemenu[CR]- Add option to disable Widget fanart[CR]- Shuffle skin settings with added catagories[CR]- Add FAQ in Help section[CR]- Add option to hide Home Window elements when pressing back[CR]- Add option to use paused label instead of image[CR]- Add snow to Music Viz background[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v6.0.1[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and improvements[CR][I]v6.0.8[/I][CR]- Fix navigation issue for centered menu[CR]- Update language files from Transifex[CR]- Fix InfoWall overlap issue[I]v6.0.7[/I][CR]- Fix focus issue for Player Controls[CR]- Misc fixes for music videos[CR]- Hide Video OSD when dialogs are visible[CR][I]v6.0.6[/I][CR]- Re-design Main Menu Customizer[CR]- Re-design Fullscreen Info[CR]- Fix aspect ratio for PVR Widgets[CR]- Update language files from Transifex[CR]- Fix Home background not showing when Widget fanart is missing[CR]- Fix mouse issues in Menu customizer for Android devices[CR]- Remove skin versions of Extended Info xmls and drop support for replacing DialogVideoInfo (Can be re-added by uncommenting out onloads and visibles)[CR]- Fix some non-default font issues[CR]- DialogSelect fixes[CR]- Ask for default background when entering home[CR]- Drop script.colorbox support[CR][I]v6.0.5[/I][CR]- Fix color customization not opening[CR]- Small redesign of DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Add and fix some Widget plugin paths[CR]- Revert PNG changes that altered panel colors[CR]- Add support for animated weather icons[CR]- Add background selection to Music Viz[CR]- Add LibreELEC to settings[CR][I]v6.0.4[/I][CR]- Compatibility updates for new Skin Helper version[CR]- Add manfeeds Video Lyrics mod v2 (thanks manfeed)[CR]- Add option to hide player control buttons on Music OSD[CR]- Redesigned System Settings screen[CR]- New logo (thanks GTunney!)[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master

extension.description: Komplett neu designed für ein modernes Aussehen und das klassische Aeon-Feeling beizubehalten.
Πλήρως επανασχεδιασμένο για να προσφέρει μια μοντέρνα αισθητική, διατηρώντας ταυτόχρονα την κλασική ομορφιά του Aeon.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
Completamente rediseñado para crear un aspecto moderno, pero conservando el toque clásico Aeon.
Täysin uudelleensuunniteltu moderni ulkoasu, kuitenkin tuntuen klassiselta Aeonilta.
Complètement remanié pour créer une apparence moderne, tout en conservant l'esprit classique d'Aeon.
Totalement revu pour créer un look moderne, en gardant l'expérience Aeon.
Redeseñado completamente para crear unha aparencia moderna ao tempo que mantén a sensación do clásico Aeon.
עיצוב חדש היוצר מראה מודרני אך משמר את ההרגשה של Aeon הקלאסי.
Potpuno preoblikovan moderan izgled, uz zadržani klasični Aeon osjećaj.
Teljesen áttervezett modern kinézet, de megtartva a klasszikus Aeon érzetet.
Endurhannað nútímalegt útlit í anda Aeon.
Completamente ridisegnato per creare un look moderno, mantenendo la consueta qualità Aeon.
고전적인 Aeon 느낌을 유지하면서 현대적인 모습으로 완전히 다시 디자인하여 만들었습니다.
Pilnai atnaujinta, kad sukurtų modernią išvaizdą, išlaikant klasikinio Aeon pojūtį.
Direka semula sepenuhnya untuk hasilkan penampilan modern, tetapi masih mengekalkan penampilan Aeon klasik.
Helt redesignet for å gi deg en moderne utforming, samtidig som man beholder den klassiske Aeon følelsen.
Volledig opnieuw ontworpen om een ​​moderne look te creëren, met behoud van het klassieke Aeon gevoel.
Całkowicie przeprojektowana skóra Aeon, o nowoczesnym wyglądzie, zachowując klasyczny układ skóry Aeon.
Design completamente novo para criar um look moderno, mantendo o feeling do Aeon Clássico.
Completamente redesenhado para criar um visual moderno enquanto retém o toque clássico Aeon.
Complet reproiectat pentru a crea o înfățișare modernă, dar totuși păstrând atmosfera clasică Aeon.
полностью переделенная, модернизированная классическая обложка Aeon.
Kompletne prepracovaný dizajn s moderným vzhľadom pri zachovaní klasického štýlu Aeon.
Totalt omarbetad för att skapa ett modernt utseende, samtidigt som man behåller den klassiska Aeon-känslan.
การออกแบบใหม่หมดจด เพื่อสร้างรูปลักษณ์ทันสมัย, ​​ขณะที่ยังคงความรู้สึกคลาสสิคของ Aeon.
Modern görünüme kavuşturmak için baştan tasarlandı, klasik Aeon hissi korundu
Thiết kế lại hoàn toàn để tạo nên một phong cách hiện đại, trong khi đó vẫn duy trì một cảm giác Aeon cổ điển.
完全的翻新設計以創造現代化的視覺感受，同時仍維持Aeon的經典外觀。
